channel.title: Looking For a Host
channel.description:
Prologue : I know that everyone is going to say stuff and flame me such as
"Get A BETTER COMPUTER YOU FUCKING NOOB"
and frankly I don't care. I dont have the time just to host a damn server so I'm just asking around for someone who might have a fast computer and would like to host a server.
Requirements : 600Mb+ RAM 200MBs+ Connection Speed Some Intelligence The Ability to keep your computer running 24/7 SOME java knowledge
Information : You need to make sure how have all of the following, please post a picture of your RAM and Connection speed for me to verify that you have a minimum requirements needed. Thanks for the help if you do decide to help! You will need to have those require ment

item.title: Looking For a Host
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Yeah? Do you??? Prove it…

Read full topic

item.title: Looking For a Host
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

LOL no one would keep there computer running 24/7 search up on google or somwething or go to ragezone. To make a server 24/7 get some ppl together that have different timezones and then send a copy of the “run.bat” to each of them. Make sure that when one of them is in bed that the other (s) is not. Thats not such a bad way to make it 24/7 yet you could just find a host

Read full topic
